  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.utils.Cullable, com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.utils.Layout

    public class PropertySlider
extends com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.ui.WidgetGroup
    UI element representing a slider that is linked to an algorithm's Property with additional labels depicting the function of the slider
